body:
Well, some peeps have been very jealous of Nebula you see, So I did some research of some peeps who tried to sell or copy Nebula or Avicus's plugins lol :D
Hope you enjoy, please dont attack these peeps and these posts are from like 2014 lol

Some CHEAP CHUMP TRIED TO INPERSONATE THE OWNER OF THE SERVER AND SELL THE ORIGNAL NEBULA PLUGIN FOR $300
http://www.lilypadmc.org/threads/avicus.556/

Also some chump tried to copy it XD
https://bukkit.org/threads/plugin-to-create-nebula-and-join-signs.277900/

PFFH ANOTHER BONZI BUDDY TRIED 2 
https://www.spigotmc.org/threads/break-the-monument-btm.14485/

I also found something interesting, there was supposed to be a gamemode exclusive to Avicus called WolvesvsPigs,
Wot happened to dat?

Nice way to copy someones homework
https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/nexus-bernatixer


Anyways, CLICKN OUT

title: Plugin Thiefs lol

replies.body: http://www.lilypadmc.org/threads/avicus.556/  funkystudios is Keenan, the owner lol.

replies.body:
I mean, other than that first link, there isn't really any "guy steals Avicus plugin" drama. Like one of the links is someone asking for a plugin like Avicus', and the other is just a plugin for a like what Avicus has. In no way was Avicus the first server to have these gamemodes, or a plugin to run the gamemodes. The last link looks like someone made a very basic version of the plugin, which again isn't stealing.

Plus the fact that they're all from like 3 years ago really adds to the level of interest?
